parameterdescription.para: The maximum number of bytes to test.

simplesect.para: False if a or b is null, false if the first character in a does not equal the first character in b, otherwise returns the result of strncmp.

briefdescription.para: Counts the number of characters up to the first occurrence of a null character '\0'

parameterdescription.para: The char pointer to use to compute the length

briefdescription.para: Provides conversion utilities between char pointers and strings.
